name: STRIDERS
description:
STRIDERS is a runner-shooter in the spirit of BIT.TRIP RUNNER, Megaman. Done by a team of two game designers, four artists and one musician. Don't hesitate to visit our site: Team-KwaKwa

Soundtracks? Listen it on Soundcloud

Controls:

w: jump
s: slide
a: back
d: front
ENTER: shoot
R-CTRL: switch
r: reset
SPACE: pause

XBOX 360:
A: jump
DOWN: slide
LEFT: back
RIGHT: front
X: shoot
RB: switch
BACK: reset
START: pause
